question.text: In the past 2 weeks: Have you felt nervous, agitated or irritable?
In the past 2 weeks: Have you felt sad and hopeless?
In the last 2 weeks: Have you felt that you tend to isolate yourself from others and spend more time alone?
In the last 2 weeks: Have you had sleep disturbances (sleeping too much or too little)?
In the past 2 weeks: How often have you put off playing sports or practicing a hobby of yours (playing an instrument, painting, reading, etc.)?
In the last 2 weeks: How often have you postponed appointments already scheduled?
In the last 2 weeks: Have you experienced eating problems? Eat more or lose your appetite?
In the last 2 weeks: Have you felt more tired or dehydrated?
In the past 2 weeks: Have you felt the need to drink more alcohol or smoke more?
In the past 2 weeks: Have you thought about suicide?
